intro: Byttneria herbacea, commonly known as the slender byttneria, is a flowering plant belonging to the Malvaceae family. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant features opposite, ovate leaves with a rough texture and prominent veins. Its small, clustered flowers are usually yellow or greenish-yellow, with five petals. Byttneria herbacea is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories or along stream banks.
